name: Fjallraven High Coast Lite Trousers - Women's
description:
Lightweight pants for high deserts or sun-exposed sections of trail. The tapered cut and easy stretch let you move freely down trails or up scrambly sections.Lightweight stretch fabricWaist is cut high in the back for coverage and comfort under a backpack.Tapered leg.Hand pockets, one zippered leg pocket and two buttoned back pockets, all with ventilating mesh lining.Cuffs have reflective drawstring adjustments to add visibility in the dark.

        Sustainability
